body_html:
@ashwhall That’s solely depending on your definition to “commodity” hardware. If you only use GbE network, the bandwidth of a PCIe NV GPU to memory will be 128x larger than your network (128Gb/s vs 1Gb/s).

Yet from my perspective, an 100Gbps NIC shall be considered as commodity in 2018 :)

body:
@ashwhall That’s solely depending on your definition to “commodity” hardware. If you only use GbE network, the bandwidth of a PCIe NV GPU to memory will be 128x larger than your network (128Gb/s vs 1Gb/s).

Yet from my perspective, an 100Gbps NIC shall be considered as commodity in 2018 :)
